  • Field Details

    • board

      public Tile[][] board

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numPlayers)
      Create a board for a specified number of players. It initializes the board with empty tiles. It initializes tilesList with all the possible tiles.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players

  • Method Details

    • fillBoard

      public void fillBoard()
      Fills the empty cells of the board, if accessible. It randomically takes the tiles from tilesList, add them to the board and remove them from the list. In this way there is no possibility for a tile to be used two times in the same game.

    • isBoardEmpty

      public boolean isBoardEmpty()
      Determine if the board has to be filled.
      Returns:
      true only if the board has to be filled, false otherwise.

    • AvailableTiles

      public Set<Position> AvailableTiles()
      Returns a set of positions in which the tiles can be picked from the player. A tile can be picked if it has an empty or not accessible side on the board.
      Returns:
      a set of available positions.

    • RemoveTiles

      public void RemoveTiles(List<Position> ToRemove)
      Remove tiles from the board indexed by the given positions.
      Parameters:
      ToRemove - a set of positions.

    • cloneBoard

      public void cloneBoard(Board newBoard)
      It copies the current board into a given one passed by parameter.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(Position p)
      Gets the tile on the position passed by parameter.

    • getNumCols

      public int getNumCols()
      Gets the number of columns of the board

    • getNumRows

      public int getNumRows()
      Gets the number of rows of the board
